data.cardSubtitle: Firstly, the video you wish to synopsis must be in the mp4 format and should be smaller than 300MB.
If your video meets these requirements, you should click the Let's Start button on the homepage and upload your video.
Upon completion of the upload process, your video will undergo AI processing by our application, and the summarized version will be available for download.
If you are logged into our application, you can access your summarized video in the Videos section.
